summary: Increases price of silver, bronze and dwarven pottery. Intended for thief characters but useful for any dungeon crawling adventurer!
descriptionHtml: Simple mod I put together in 5 minutes. Increases prices of silver, ancient nordic bronze and dwarven pottery and utensils to make them worth picking up. Also makes dwarven metals more valuable. A great way for any starting thief to make a living robbing houses, or for dungeon raiding adventurers to attain wealth selling artifacts of civilizations long past.
author: Phukengruven
